headline: Linus Health's AI-Driven Voice Analysis Technology Recognized in Gartner® Hype Cycle™ for Digital Care Delivery, 2025
summary: Linus Health, an AI-driven brain health company pioneering early detection of cognitive impairment and personalized intervention, today announced it has been recognized in the Gartner Hype Cycle for Digital Care Delivery, 2025 report under the category of Digital Clinical Voice Analysis.

raw.headline: Linus Health's AI-Driven Voice Analysis Technology Recognized in Gartner® Hype Cycle™ for Digital Care Delivery, 2025

headline: Global AI spending to approach $1.5 trillion this year: Gartner
summary: Hyperscaler investments in GPUs and accelerators will nearly double the size of the AI server market, the analyst firm said Wednesday.
